verses.verse: Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H5375><s%> on his journey, <S%H7272><s%> and came <S%H1980><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the east. <S%H6924><s%>

And he looked, <S%H7200><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> a well <S%H875><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%> were lying <S%H7257><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> it, for from that well <S%H875><s%> they watered <S%H8248><s%> the flocks. <S%H5739><s%> Now the stone <S%H68><s%> on the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the well <S%H875><s%> was large. <S%H1419><s%>

When all <S%H3605><s%> the flocks <S%H5739><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> they would then roll <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the well, <S%H875><s%> and water <S%H8248><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and put <S%H7725><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> in its place <S%H4725><s%> on the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the well. <S%H875><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, "My brothers, <S%H251><s%> where <S%H370><s%> are you from?" And they said, <S%H559><s%> "We are from Haran. <S%H2771><s%>"
And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Do you know <S%H3045><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nahor <S%H5152><s%>?" And they said, <S%H559><s%> "We know <S%H3045><s%> [him.]"

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Is it well <S%H7965><s%> with him?" And they said, <S%H559><s%> "It is well, <S%H7965><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> is coming <S%H935><s%> with the sheep. <S%H6629><s%>"

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2005><s%> it is still <S%H5750><s%> high <S%H1419><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> it is not time <S%H6256><s%> for the livestock <S%H4735><s%> to be gathered. <S%H622><s%> Water <S%H8248><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and go, <S%H1980><s%> pasture <S%H7462><s%> them."

But they said, <S%H559><s%> "We cannot, <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the flocks <S%H5739><s%> are gathered, <S%H622><s%> and they roll <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the well; <S%H875><s%> then we water <S%H8248><s%> the sheep. <S%H6629><s%>"
While he was still <S%H5750><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> with them, Rachel <S%H7354><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with her father's sheep, <S%H6629><s%> for she was a shepherdess. <S%H7462><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when <S%H9201><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's brother, <S%H251><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's brother, <S%H251><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H5066><s%> up, and rolled <S%H1556><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the well, <S%H875><s%> and watered <S%H8248><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's brother. <S%H251><s%>
Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> that he was a relative <S%H251><s%> of her father and that he was Rebekah's son, <S%H1><s%> and she ran <S%H1121><s%> and told <S%H7323><s%> her father.

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when Laban <S%H3837><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the news <S%H8088><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his sister's son, <S%H1121><s%> that he ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> him, and embraced <S%H2263><s%> him and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him, and brought <S%H935><s%> him to his house. <S%H1004><s%> Then he related <S%H5608><s%> to Laban <S%H3837><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things. <S%H1697><s%>
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Surely <S%H389><s%> you are my bone <S%H6106><s%> and my flesh. <S%H1320><s%>" And he stayed <S%H3427><s%> with him a month. <S%H2320><s%>

Then Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> you are my relative, <S%H251><s%> should you therefore serve <S%H5647><s%> me for nothing <S%H2600><s%>? Tell <S%H5046><s%> me, what <S%H4100><s%> shall your wages <S%H4909><s%> be?"

Now Laban <S%H3837><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> daughters; <S%H1323><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the older <S%H1419><s%> was Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the younger <S%H6996><s%> was Rachel. <S%H7354><s%>
And Leah's eyes <S%H5869><s%> were weak, <S%H7390><s%> but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was beautiful <S%H3303><s%> of form <S%H8389><s%> and face. <S%H4758><s%>

Now Jacob <S%H3290><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> so he said, <S%H559><s%> "I will serve <S%H5647><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for your younger <S%H6996><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> Rachel. <S%H7354><s%>"

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is better <S%H2896><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> her to you than <S%H4480><s%> that I should give <S%H5414><s%> her to another <S%H312><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> stay <S%H3427><s%> with me."

So Jacob <S%H3290><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel <S%H7354><s%> and they seemed <S%H1961><s%> <S%H5869><s%> to him but a few <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> because of his love <S%H160><s%> for her.

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> "Give <S%H3051><s%> [me] my wife, <S%H802><s%> for my time <S%H3117><s%> is completed, <S%H4390><s%> that I may go <S%H935><s%> in to her."
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of the place, <S%H4725><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> a feast. <S%H4960><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the evening <S%H6153><s%> that he took <S%H3947><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> her to him; and [Jacob] went <S%H935><s%> in to her.
Laban <S%H3837><s%> also gave <S%H5414><s%> his maid <S%H8198><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> to his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> as a maid. <S%H8198><s%>

So it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the morning <S%H1242><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it was Leah! <S%H3812><s%> And he said <S%H559><s%> to Laban, <S%H3837><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> to me? Was it not for Rachel <S%H7354><s%> that I served <S%H5647><s%> with you? Why <S%H4100><s%> then have you deceived <S%H7411><s%> me?"

But Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "It is not the practice <S%H6213><s%> <S%H3651><s%> in our place, <S%H4725><s%> to marry <S%H5414><s%> off <S%H5414><s%> the younger <S%H6810><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the first-born.

"Complete <S%H4390><s%> the week <S%H7620><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> one, <S%H2088><s%> and we will give <S%H5414><s%> you the other <S%H2088><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> with me for another <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>"

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> and completed <S%H4390><s%> her week, <S%H7620><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> as his wife. <S%H802><s%>
Laban <S%H3837><s%> also gave <S%H5414><s%> his maid <S%H8198><s%> Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> to his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> as her maid. <S%H8198><s%>

So [Jacob] went <S%H935><s%> in to Rachel <S%H7354><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and indeed <S%H1571><s%> he loved <S%H157><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and he served <S%H5647><s%> with Laban for another <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Leah <S%H3812><s%> was unloved, <S%H8130><s%> and He opened <S%H6605><s%> her womb, <S%H7358><s%> but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was barren. <S%H6135><s%>

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> and named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> for she said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> my affliction; <S%H6040><s%> surely <S%H3588><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> will love <S%H157><s%> me."

Then she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has heard <S%H8085><s%> that I am unloved, <S%H8130><s%> He has therefore given <S%H5414><s%> me this <S%H2088><s%> [son] also. <S%H1571><s%>" So she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Simeon. <S%H8095><s%>

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Now <S%H6258><s%> this <S%H6471><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> will become <S%H3867><s%> attached <S%H3867><s%> to me, because <S%H3588><s%> I have borne <S%H3205><s%> him three <S%H7969><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>" Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> he was named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Levi. <S%H3878><s%>

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H6471><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>" Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> she named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> him Judah. <S%H3063><s%> Then she stopped <S%H5975><s%> bearing. <S%H3205><s%>
